ComicInfo.Title: False Impressions
ComicInfo.Summary:
WHAT ARE LITTLE BOYS MADE OF? - Part 2 of 5. Static faces would-be hero Palisade, an armored knight who leaves darkness in his path. But Palisade is convinced that he and Static are at cross-purposes and winds up endangering Rick, Rick's injured friend and Frieda.
As Static tries to get Rick and his friend to the hospital, they are intercepted by Palisade, who tries to pick a fight with Static. Static finally talks Palisade out of fighting and gets Rick to the hospital. Virgil now has to deal with the fact that Rick is really gay. Frieda and Virgil discuss the fact Rick is gay and we learn that Virgil has a certain prejudice. Static confronts Palisade and get into a big argument on how to be a superhero. We see Virgil and his friends discussing their comic book. Static finally stops Palisade from trying to impress other people, and also stops him from going after the Blood Syndicate. Rick tells his friends that he is gay, all of them!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:39:51. [CVDB39954]
ComicInfo.Colorist: J. Scott J., Jason Scott Jones
ComicInfo.Characters: Frieda Goren, Jean Hawkins, Larry Wade, Rick Stone, Static
